section.p: The template supports the definition of a pool (group) that is created in order to allow findings that refer to a group of subjects rather than to a single one. When a pool is defined, it may be the subject of the report.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1138)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1139)/@code="SPtbd" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1140)
A code to indicate the act of joining a group of subjects into a pool for the purpose of structuring reporting from the trial.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1141)
The identifier for the pool. It is the linking value that is used as a common identifier for all members of the pool. [SEND: POOLID]

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:1142)
The association establishes the link between the pool and its members.
Such participants SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RCT" (CONF:1143)
Such participants SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:1144)
The association provides identifying information for the individual pool member.
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="IDENT" (CONF:1145)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1146)
An identifier assigned to a pool member. The identifier value must be usable within the context of the study so that data collected for the pool can be merged with that collected for the study subject. [SEND: USUBJID]
The association provides identifying information for the individual pool member.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1138)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1141)
The identifier for the pool. It is the linking value that is used as a common identifier for all members of the pool. [SEND: POOLID]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1139)/@code="SPtbd" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1140)
A code to indicate the act of joining a group of subjects into a pool for the purpose of structuring reporting from the trial.

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:1142)
The association establishes the link between the pool and its members.
Such participants SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RCT" (CONF:1143)
Such participants SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:1144)
The association provides identifying information for the individual pool member.
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="IDENT" (CONF:1145)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1146)
An identifier assigned to a pool member. The identifier value must be usable within the context of the study so that data collected for the pool can be merged with that collected for the study subject. [SEND: USUBJID]
The association provides identifying information for the individual pool member.

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <act xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd" classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.94"/> <id root="1644433569" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="SPtbd" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <participant typeCode="RCT"> <participantRole classCode="IDENT"/> </participant> </act>
